com.madrobot.graphics.bitmap

Class OutputConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.madrobot.graphics.bitmap.OutputConfiguration

  • public class OutputConfiguration
extends Object
    Configuration settings for the output bitmap when using any of the bitmap filters.
    Author:
    elton.stephen.kent

      • setAffectedArea

        public void setAffectedArea(Rectangle affectedArea)
        Set the area of the bitmap that should be affected by the filter.
        Parameters:
        affectedArea - if null, the filter is applied to the whole bitmap.

      • setCanRecycleSrc

        public void setCanRecycleSrc(boolean canRecycleSrc)
        Recycle the src image.

        The default is false.

        Parameters:
        canRecycleSrc -

      • setConfig

        public void setConfig(Bitmap.Config config)
        Set the configuration of the o/p bitmap.

        The default configuration is ARGB_8888.
        This field is not used if #setModifySource(boolean) is set to true.

        Parameters:
        config -
